events.title: EXPLORATION OF TREE VARIANTS IN MIT CAMPUS
events.content: NSS student volunteers were split into groups and made to count tree variants in MIT campus and data were stored in padlet.

events.title: INAUGURATION
events.content: Inauguration of the camp 2022 was held in the presence of Mr.Ganesh, the Head Master of Government Higher Secondary School,Somangalam ,the programme officer of  NSS and the student volunteers.

events.title: YOGA SESSION
events.content: Dr. Neelavathy Pari mam, our programme officer, led a yoga session for all of the NSS volunteers. It brought all of the volunteers a lot of comfort. Stress-relieving meditation and asanas were used to improve mental and physical wellness.

events.title: VACCINATION CAMP
events.content: The Vaccination Camp jointly organized by NSS MIT & Primary Govt. Hospital Somangalam .Since 2019, corona has been regarded as a fatal disease, many families losing loved ones and others in severe condition. Corona vaccination is the only way to get rid of it. We (PROGRAMME OFFICERS,NSS VOLUNTEERS) held a vaccination programme in Somangalam Primary Health Centre to ensure the safety of many lives.First and Second dosage of vaccination were made available to the locality people. Along with primary health centre, our volunteers coordinated the vaccination camp.

events.title: PRIMARY HEALTH CENTER CLEANING
events.content: Volunteers assisted in shifting and arranging of impaired goods, as well as watering plants and trees around the health centre.

events.title: VILLAGE SURVEY
events.content: Thirty NSS volunteers involved in a survey conducted in Somangalam to know about their challenges in society, as well as some questions about road facilities and water scarcity.

events.title: EXERCISE SESSION
events.content: One of the volunteers gave the other volunteers some fitness advice. It was a good warm-up for our volunteers.

events.title: SCHOOL CLEANING
events.content: Around 60 volunteers helped in cleaning the campus of the Government higher secondary school in Somangalam, removing plastics. Plastics were gathered and disposed properly without causing harm to the environment.

events.title: INTERACTIVE SESSION
events.content: Our final-year volunteers led the interactive session.Volunteers were given the opportunity to speak about their goals and dreams.

events.title: GOVERNMENT SCHEME AWARENESS
events.content: NREGA workers were informed about the government schemes accessible to them and the benefits of the schemes by volunteers and our beloved programme officers.

events.title: GROUND CLEANING
events.content: Our volunteers cleaned and disposed litter and plant residues that had accumulated on the school grounds.

events.title: CAREER GUIDANCE
events.content: MR.PARI and MS.LAVANYA, MIT alumini, presented career advice to the volunteers on civil service tests, shared their experience and problems they had while preparing for it.

events.title: COMPETITION FOR SCHOOL STUDENTS
events.content: The volunteers held competitions for the pupils of the Government higher secondary school in Somangalam, such as drawing, spelling bee, and quizzes. The pupils excitedly engaged and received numerous awards that aided in the development of their skills. It provided volunteers the opportunity to interact with them.

events.title: YOUTH FOR GREEN INDIA
events.content: Mr.Kapil Dev (GREEN MAN OF CHENNAI) spoke about the benefits of planting trees as well as the issues of deforestation. He also shared his life experiences and obstacles while performing these tasks. Then he presented a plant to our NSS. He had a fantastic rapport with the volunteers.

events.title: SCHOOL TEACHING
events.content: Volunteers met school students and inquire about their aspirations of the future. The volunteers were requested by the students to clarify their doubts. Volunteers gave them encouraging speeches and shared their experiences.

events.title: PRIZE DISTRIBUTION
events.content: The winners of the competition held on the 5th Day were awarded prizes. The pupils were overjoyed to receive rewards, and they expressed their gratitude to the volunteers .

events.title: WALL PAINTING
events.content: India and Tamilnadu map was painted on the wall and their names were written on the painting by our volunteers .
